sentences.sContent: St. Stephen, the first Christian martyr
sentences.sCn: 圣司提反，第一个基督教殉道者

sentences.sContent: The army has been held back because the government is reluctant to make martyrs of the protesters.
sentences.sCn: 军队后撤了，因为政府不愿意造成抗议者牺牲。

remMethod.val: 本身为词根， 指“目击者”

trans.tranOther: someone who dies for their religious or political beliefs and is admired by people for this
